title: Create Brother's Live Cartoon booking service website

requirements.text: Create a landing page displaying business information for Brother's Live Cartoon including: company name 'BROTHER'S LIVE CARTOON', tagline 'Live Cartoon Characters', address 'Raval Chakala, Jaghnath Bhaghol, Umreth - 388220, Dist - Anand', contact phone number '9427065911', list of available characters (Gorilla, Red Teddy, Yellow Teddy, Doraemon, Mickey Mouse, Motu-Patlu), event types supported (Birthday Party, Wedding Entry and other Events), and service highlights (High Quality Costumes, Energetic Performers, Reasonable Rates)
acceptanceCriteria: All business information is displayed clearly and accurately
Character list shows all six characters mentioned
Address and contact information are prominently visible

requirements.text: Implement a 'Call Now' button that opens the phone dialer with the phone number 9427065911 prefilled when clicked
acceptanceCriteria: Call button is clearly visible and labeled 'Call Now'
Clicking the button opens the device's phone dialer

requirements.text: Implement a 'Book on WhatsApp' button that opens WhatsApp with a prefilled message 'Hello BROTHER'S LIVE CARTOON, I want to book a cartoon character.' addressed to phone number 919427065911

quotes: https://wa.me/91$phone?text=Hello BROTHER'S LIVE CARTOON, I want to book a cartoon character.

acceptanceCriteria: WhatsApp button is clearly visible and labeled 'Book on WhatsApp'
Clicking the button opens WhatsApp web or app
Message is prefilled with the exact text: 'Hello BROTHER'S LIVE CARTOON, I want to book a cartoon character.'
Message is addressed to the correct WhatsApp number: 919427065911

requirements.text: Apply a vibrant, playful visual theme suitable for a children's entertainment service with warm, inviting colors (orange accent color as primary brand color), rounded friendly shapes, and engaging typography that conveys fun and professionalism
acceptanceCriteria: Orange is used as the primary accent color throughout the design
Typography is clear, friendly, and appropriate for a family service
Overall design feels warm, inviting, and professional
Layout uses visual hierarchy to guide users to key information and action buttons

requirements.text: Render generated character images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated and display them in the character showcase section
acceptanceCriteria: Character images are stored in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Images are displayed in the available characters section
Images load correctly and enhance the visual presentation

constraints: Phone number 9427065911 must remain exactly as specified
WhatsApp prefilled message text must be 'Hello BROTHER'S LIVE CARTOON, I want to book a cartoon character.' without modification
Business name must be displayed as 'BROTHER'S LIVE CARTOON' with exact capitalization and punctuation
Orange must be used as the primary brand color

required: Colorful cartoon gorilla character mascot in costume, friendly and energetic pose (gorilla.dim_400x400.png)
Cute red teddy bear character mascot in costume, welcoming pose (red-teddy.dim_400x400.png)
Cheerful yellow teddy bear character mascot in costume, playful pose (yellow-teddy.dim_400x400.png)
Doraemon character mascot, iconic blue cat robot with friendly expression (doraemon.dim_400x400.png)
Mickey Mouse character mascot in classic pose with welcoming gesture (mickey-mouse.dim_400x400.png)
Motu-Patlu character duo mascots, both characters together in friendly pose (motu-patlu.dim_400x400.png)
Vibrant birthday party scene with cartoon characters and children celebrating, colorful balloons and decorations (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
